title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, April 27, 2021
description: Playwright August Wilson was born on this day in 1945. For decades he brought black voices to the stage, and this past year his play “Ma Rainey’s Black Bottom” was released as a film.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Playwright August Wilson was born on this day in 1945. For decades he brought black voices to the stage, and this past year his play “Ma Rainey’s Black Bottom” was released as a film.
